node_info.description: Route items depending on defined expression or rules
node_info.name: Switch
node_info.subtitle: =mode: {{((template: capitalize))($parameter["mode"])}}
node_info.outputs_note: Dynamic outputs based on node configuration

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Build a matching rule for each output

options.name: Rules
options.description: Build a matching rule for each output

options.name: Expression
options.description: Write an expression to return the output index

properties.name: output
properties.description: The output index to send the input item to. Use an expression to calculate which input item should be routed to which output. The expression must return a number.
properties.hint: The index to route the item to, starts at 0

properties.name: rules
properties.description: The label of output to which to send data to if rule matches

properties.name: options
properties.description: If no rule matches the item will be sent to this output, by default they will be ignored

options.name: fallbackOutput
options.description: If no rule matches the item will be sent to this output, by default they will be ignored

options.name: ignoreCase
options.description: Whether to ignore letter case when evaluating conditions

options.displayName: Send data to all matching outputs
options.name: allMatchingOutputs
options.description: Whether to send data to all outputs meeting conditions (and not just the first one)

properties.name: looseTypeValidation
properties.description: If the type of an expression doesn't match the type of the comparison, n8n will try to cast the expression to the required type. E.g. for booleans "false" or 0 will be cast to false

possibleValues.name: Rules
possibleValues.description: Build a matching rule for each output

possibleValues.name: Expression
possibleValues.description: Write an expression to return the output index

subProperties.name: fallbackOutput
subProperties.description: If no rule matches the item will be sent to this output, by default they will be ignored

subProperties.name: ignoreCase
subProperties.description: Whether to ignore letter case when evaluating conditions

subProperties.displayName: Send data to all matching outputs
subProperties.name: allMatchingOutputs
subProperties.description: Whether to send data to all outputs meeting conditions (and not just the first one)

hints.text: The index to route the item to, starts at 0

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
